channel.title: reticulate on TwoSidesData

item.title: exploratory data analysis: basic pandas and dplyr
item.description: This is an basic example of how you can use either R or Python to acomplish the same goals, I really enjoy using the tidyverse but as you will see sometimes Python is just the more intuitive option. If you find yourself confused on whether a code chunk is an R or Python code please ask me or check my github page for this project. 1 Getting Started, we will use multiple functions from both languages 1.
